name: START EARLY (FOR FIRST FIVE YEARS FUND) FKA OUNCE OF PREVENTION (FOR FFYF)
description: Early childhood programs, training and advocacy.
sampleDescriptions: Promote expansion of early learning opportunities, including Child Care Development Block Grants; reauthorization of home-visiting programs (MIECHV); preschool development grants.
